extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • grantAccessToUsers

        @RequestMapping(value="/users",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<List<UserDTO>> grantAccessToUsers(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String serviceId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String[] userNames)
        Grant access to the location to the user (deploy on the location)
        Parameters:
        serviceId - The location's id.
        userNames - The authorized users.
        Returns:
        A Void RestResponse.

      • revokeUserAccess

        @RequestMapping(value="/users/{username}",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<List<UserDTO>> revokeUserAccess(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String serviceId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String username)
        Revoke the user's authorisation to access the location
        Parameters:
        serviceId - The id of the location.
        username - The authorized user.
        Returns:
        A Void RestResponse.

      • getAuthorizedUsers

        @RequestMapping(value="/users",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<List<UserDTO>> getAuthorizedUsers(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      String serviceId)

        Returns:
        list of all users.

                produces="application/json")
